questiontext.text: We roll a pure die once. We define the events A, B and C as follows:？  A = the number of eyes is divisible by three. B = “the number of eyes is less than five”. C = “the number of eyes is even”.  Verify that each of statements I and II is correct. Choose then choose one of alternatives a, b, c or d.______________.  I. A and B are independent. II. A and C are independent.Ê.  Choose the correct answer below.

answer.text: I is correct and II is correct.

feedback.text: I is correct and II is correct: Incorrect

answer.text: I is true and II is false.

feedback.text: I is correct and II is incorrect: Incorrect

answer.text: I is incorrect and II is true.

feedback.text: I is incorrect and II is correct…: Incorrect

answer.text: I is incorrect and II is incorrect.

feedback.text: I is incorrect and II is incorrect: Correct
